name: Pawmot
description: The Hands-On Pokémon. This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from electricity or electric-type attacks. Instead, half of any electric damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.description: This Pokémon is cured of negative status ailments upon returning to its Pokeball.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: When attacking with a punch-based move (Mega Punch, Dynamic Punch, Ice/Fire/Thunder Punch, etc.), this Pokémon may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
